title: Home categories UI
description: Build Home screen categories UI and navigation to category results.

title: Warp MCP setup + verification
description: Configure Warp MCP with Sentry MCP server and verify issue queries.
close_reason: Warp + Codex MCP verified; Sentry org list accessible

title: Placeholder views + theming foundation
description: Epic app-shell task 004. Source: .claude/epics/app-shell/004.md (PRD: .claude/prds/app-shell.md). Create placeholder views for Home, Search, Detail with theming foundation (Theme.swift, color assets, VideoGridView component). Completed: VideoGridView, Theme.swift, BrandPrimary/Secondary colors, dark mode support.

title: search-backend: YouTube API integration with recipe bias (#15)
description:
GitHub: https://github.com/TWO22-Org/rezipe/issues/15
Epic: search-backend
Acceptance: YouTube API v3 client with query augmentation and safeSearch strict.

title: search-backend: Caching layer + cache key normalization (#16)
description:
GitHub: https://github.com/TWO22-Org/rezipe/issues/16
Epic: search-backend
Depends on #14. Normalize query + locale keys, cache hit/miss handling.

title: iOS Sentry SDK + performance + tags
description: Add Sentry Cocoa SDK with error + performance capture and tagging on iOS.
notes: Unblocked: iOS scaffold added under src/frontend (Xcode project still needed).

title: Categories endpoint + seed data
description: Create GET /categories endpoint and seed curated categories for MVP.

title: search-backend: GET /search Edge Function deployment (#17)
description:
GitHub: https://github.com/TWO22-Org/rezipe/issues/17
Epic: search-backend
Depends on #14/#15/#16. Implement GET /search with cache + YouTube API + error format.

title: NavigationStack per tab with detail push
description: Epic app-shell task 003. Wrap each tab in NavigationStack, preserve navigation state per tab, add VideoDetailView with push navigation.

title: Edge Functions Sentry SDK + performance + tags
description: Add Sentry Deno SDK to Edge Functions with error + performance capture and tagging.
notes: Added Sentry init + capture in src/backend/functions/_shared/sentry.ts and wired into health function. Uses env vars and high-privacy defaults.
close_reason: Edge Functions scaffold wired to Sentry (init + capture + tags)

title: Search results show list of YouTube videos; open recipe detail only on selection
description: Update Search UX so typing a query shows a list of matching YouTube videos (titles/metadata) without auto-opening the recipe page. Only navigate to recipe detail when a user taps a specific video result. Acceptance: (1) Search results list appears after submit or change; (2) tapping a result navigates to detail; (3) no auto-navigation on search text change.

title: Category caching + basic tests
description: Add category caching and basic tests for category fetch behavior.

title: Sentry projects + DSNs + privacy defaults
description: Create Sentry projects (rezipe-ios, rezipe-edge), capture DSNs, and define high-privacy defaults.
notes: DSNs stored in .env.local (SENTRY_DSN_IOS, SENTRY_DSN_EDGE); .env.local added to .gitignore.
close_reason: DSNs stored in .env.local; privacy defaults defined

title: Tab navigation with Home + Search
description: Epic app-shell task 002. Implement TabView with Home and Search tabs, SF Symbols icons, tab selection state.

title: Category results list integration
description: Wire category selection to results list using category seed terms.

title: search-backend: search_cache table schema + migration (#14)
description:
GitHub: https://github.com/TWO22-Org/rezipe/issues/14
Epic: search-backend
Acceptance: create search_cache table with TTL columns and index on expires_at.

title: App shell: Xcode project setup + iOS 17 configuration
description: Epic app-shell task 001. Source: .claude/epics/app-shell/001.md (PRD: .claude/prds/app-shell.md). Decisions: project at src/frontend/ChefStream.xcodeproj, app/target name ChefStream, bundle id com.two22.chefstream, placeholder icon + launch screen. Scope: SwiftUI App lifecycle, iOS 17.0 target, builds on iOS 17 simulator.
